name: T Rangers
description:
111% X Zzoo`s New Game “T Rangers”!

Save the planet from the invasion of space!
Hire a lot of heroes to stop the spaceships.
Destroy enemies with special super human.
You can upgrade your heroes more strongly.
Enjoy an exciting battle in a fantastic space
This is a simple, addictive arcade and action strategy game

Addictive Defense Battle Game “T Rangers”
